'''Niloofar''' is a researcher of [[Sumeru Akademiya]] and a quest-exclusive [[NPC]].

She is the mentor of [[Alrani]].

==Location==
Prior to completing [[The Path of Papers]], Niloofar can be found close to the [[Teleport Waypoint]] in [[The Akademiya]], [[Sumeru City]].
